title: Stuck at 1% calculating differences!!!! Need Help Did everything i possibly know!!! Stuck AT 0%
body: im stuck at calculating differences, 1 filed scanned stuck at 0%... did everthing i possibly could think of really need some help to get my LoL Running again!!! any help is appreciated!!1

replies.body: At this point in the process, the patcher is attempting to scan files but does not have permissions to do so.  Go over each step in the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to get this fixed up.  Let me know if you have any questions!
i went through all the steps and nothing is working still...

No worries, we'd like to help!  Submit a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to us so our tech team can take a look.  Download our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to obtain a set of logs for context, and attach it to the ticket.  We'll respond asap!
